SELECT "lists".* FROM "lists" INNER JOIN "list_accounts" ON "lists"."id" = "list_accounts"."list_id" INNER JOIN "accounts" ON "accounts"."id" = "lists"."account_id" INNER JOIN "users" ON "users"."account_id" = "accounts"."id" WHERE "list_accounts"."account_id" = $? AND ("list_accounts"."follow_id" IS NOT ? OR "lists"."account_id" = $?) AND (users.current_sign_in_at > ?)
